short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay on top of your website's health. Check for incidents in your Google Search Console data with a simple graph.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üåü GSC Guardian - Your Google Search Performance Companion üåü

GSC Guardian is a feature-rich Chrome extension for Google Search Console designed to assist website owners, SEO professionals, and digital marketers improve the GSC experience. 

*** Please support this extension by giving us your rating *** 

###############
Notes: 
üåüGSC Guardian has been chosen as Best Search Software Finalist by the US Search Awards.üåü We thank each of our users for helping us reach this milestone. 

- Some are reporting missing features when updating from an old version. Please uninstall and reinstall the chrome extension to address these issues.

################

With over 10,000 users, it seamlessly integrates with Google Search Console, providing a comprehensive must-have tool for website owners, SEO professionals, and digital marketers to optimize their site's performance on Google Search.

üÜï NEW Features

1Ô∏è‚É£NEW: Fully-featured annotation system: 
Create your own notes and display them directly in Google Search Console.
2Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Incident and algorithm update visualization: 
Display the duration of core updates and algorithm changes as bars on the graph.
3Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Export and import: 
Easily export incidents and annotations to CSV or Google Sheets, and import them for seamless backups.
4Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Improved UI: 
Enjoy a pleasant, user-friendly interface with semi-transparent randomized color schemes for bars.
5Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Multi-language support: 
GSC Guardian now supports 9 languages, including English, Spanish, Dutch, French, and Portuguese.
6Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Annotation creation: 
Create annotations from anywhere using the GSC Guardian extension pop-up.
7Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Search and filter: 
Quickly find the annotations and incidents you need.
8Ô∏è‚É£ NEW: Dark mode for GSC: 
Work nights with ease. Dark mode is here for GSC.

üêõ  Bug Fixes
- Fixed an issue where bar overlays remained fixed on the page.
- Fix checkboxes not checking as expected.

üéØ Who is it for?
1Ô∏è‚É£ Website Owners
2Ô∏è‚É£ SEO Professionals
3Ô∏è‚É£ Digital Marketers

üîß Features
1Ô∏è‚É£ Historical Analysis: 
Access the complete history of Google's search algorithm updates.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Impact Assessment: 
Understand how Google's core updates may affect your site's traffic.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Downloadable Insights: 
Get data on Google's ranking algorithms and system changes.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Seamless Integration: 
The extension integrates smoothly with Google Search Console.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Real-Time, Interactive UI: 
Experience a dynamic and interactive user interface that updates in real-time.

‚ú® Benefits
1Ô∏è‚É£ Make Informed Decisions: 
Use historical data and impact assessments to inform your SEO strategies.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Stay Proactive: 
Stay ahead of Google's updates and take action to minimize potential negative impacts.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Save Time & Resources: 
Automate the process of monitoring Google's updates.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Gain a Competitive Edge: 
Stay informed and proactive to secure an edge in your SEO strategy.

üíº Use Cases
1Ô∏è‚É£ Website owners can monitor how Google's updates might affect their site's performance.
2Ô∏è‚É£ SEO professionals can conveniently track and analyze Google's core updates and ranking changes.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Digital marketers can understand how these updates might impact their marketing strategies.

üé¨ How to Use
Once installed, GSC Guardian monitors Google's updates and ranking changes in the background. It then integrates this data into Google Search Console. Users can view a graph and table of these updates directly in Google Search Console, giving them a visual overview of the updates and their timing relative to changes in their site's traffic.

‚öôÔ∏è Updates & Support
GSC Guardian is regularly updated to ensure the accuracy and relevance of the data it provides. We also have a dedicated customer support team available to assist with any questions or issues you may have.

üîú Coming Soon

GSC Guardian Pro: Create annotations from outside Google Search Console, support multi-accounts, and integrate with external sources like JIRA via JSON API connectors.

Install GSC Guardian today and unlock the full potential of Google Search Console!

Created by NODE & LINK: We expedite time to insight.
